content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching tv my kids and their friends came inside to tell us something was falling in the sky.  from first glimpse it appeared to look like and airplanes trail but we kept watching it and it was not moving forward nor up but straight down, a puff of smoke appeared as if it blew up and below that puff of smoke it appeared to still be falling until it just desintegrated.  the neighbors did get this recorded but not the puff just the first part of the falling trail.  i ran inside to call fox 4 news to see if it was the satellite being shot down and they told me that had been post poned a few hours and nothing came across the wire that the satellite was show down yet. i didn't take this anyfurther but it is bothering me.  have there been any reports of this incident or has anyone else possibly claimed to have seen this?
content.summary: A ball of smoke falling from the sky then it looked like it exploded then started falling again

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know if this is the place to put this but here goes... 
one early morning around 2 and 3 am my rotty was laying next to my bed when i was awaken by her growling i reached for her in a sleepy stooper and she kept growling at the door. i rubbed my eyes and then looked at the door way and saw 3 heads there one took his hand and lifted it up and slowly brought it down all of a sudden my dogs stopped growing and she went to sleep and when i looked back up at them they blinked and did the same hand jester and i went to sleep... 

later that morning i woke with a very very bad head ache my dog was very quite and would not come out of my room... i had a small circle wound on my calf but i dont know how it got there...  and that is all i remember on that, but after that encounter i have seen many sitings of ufos to many to recall all of them...

i do remember this one it was in the summer of 2001 i was in our pool it was an over cast day, something made me feel like i needed to look up and when i did an oval shaped mettle object appeared from the clouds. the cloud cover was very low that day so the object was not very high so and i could see windows that went from one side to the other it made no sound, and it was moving very slowly between the clouds.
content.summary: 3 entities in my house

content.detailedDescription: I was picking up my roommate from work.  he works only a few miles north of the orlando airport.  we were driving away from the airport on 436 heading towards the 408.  my roommate first noticed something hovering in the air.  i thought at first it was a huge military helicopter, and my roommate thought it was a blimp.  however, the weather was severe.  there was lightening, some rain, and very strong wind gusts.  there were blinking lights on the craft and we could almost make it out because the sky was light (even though it was 11:30pm).  the craft hovered for awhile, then moved forwards and backwards and up and down.  we started to notice that there were multiple crafts in the area.  we pulled the car over to watch the crafts and realized that they were neither helicopters or blimps (at least none that we had seen), and the inclement weather did not appear to have any effect.  we started driving again, and then noticed a huge triangular craft with lights outlining the entire craft.  at first i thought it might be a stealth bomber, but it did not quite fit that description either.  it also hovered and could move back and forth without being effected by the windy stormy weather.  we pulled the car over again.  this event was approximately 15 minutes in total.  we drove further down the road and noticed more of the elongated crafts.  we probably saw six of those in total, and one of the triangular shaped crafts.  the crafts seemed to be staying in that stretch of land between the airport and the 408 on 436, but we did not stay until they left.  we continued driving down the road to see if we encountered any more of the unusual aircraft.  we tried to call the orlando aviation authority to inquire, but the office hours were long closed.  we watched the news for any military activity, but none was reported.  we looked on the internet, and did not see anything that really resembled the enlongated crafts, but the triangular shaped one seemed to be a common sighting.  i was referred to this site by an uncle that is an avid ufo enthusiast.  this is the first time that i have seen aircraft that i could not identify.  we were very excited by the entire experience, and extremely perplexed.  unfortunately, we did not take pictures of the event.  we were too pre-occupied trying to understand what was going on.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: There were half a dozen elongated crafts and one triangle shaped one.

content.detailedDescription: Alot of planes fly over my business, at about 7pm on 2/27/08 my partner and i were having a conversation outside my shop.  i looked up because i heard a plane and noticed 5 lights falling down from the sky, they were falling straight down and i thought it was a meteor shower but then they stopped in the sky for about 30 seconds and then started zig zagging before they disappeared.  at this point all of the patron from my business and the neighboring businesses were outside because they saw my partner and i pointing at the sky and also our reactions.  as we were telling everyone what we saw two more light suddenly appeared in the sky again falling, then stop and hold for about 30 seconds and then zig zagging in the sky before disappearing.  everyone was amazed and could not believe it.  i would say atleast 15 people saw it.  i attached one photo of one of the lights.  it is the little dot in the sky that looks like a star above the big burst of light which is from the lightpost.  this was something that everyone could not believe. please feel free to contact me with questions.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 lights zig zagging then disappear, 2 minutes later 2 more lights

content.detailedDescription: My brother snapped what he thought was a shot of the mountans and later saw a disc in the background. my brother and his family pulled off the road off of rt 12 heading east towards trinidad, co - exact location on rt 12 unknown. he saw a nice view of the mountains and decided to take a picture. he snapped 3 pictures one after the other at high speed (3 picture in approx 3-4 seconds) and the disc only appeared in one. he did not notice the disc in the background for quite some time (month or two) and then one day happened to notice it while admiring the view in the picture. he noticed the object by accident. it was small in the frame so it was not clear as to what it was until he blew it up and noticed it was unusual. object appears to be a disc with a small dome on top angled at a 45 degree attitude, silver or gray in color. no lights or anything like that. no shine from the sun bouncing off of it. he thinks it must have gone down behind the mountains at a high rate of speed or it would have appeared in the other pictures as they were taken so quickly one after the other. no feelings at the time the picture was taken - did not know it was even in the picture for a month or two as stated. lost ability to capture more photos because it is suspected to have dropped behind the mountains. now see attached photos - i will include one original size and then a blown up and a false color image showing it is solid - please let me know if anyone can identify this object or authenticate it as i'm not a true believer of ufo's until one lands in my back yard and i see it up close for myself. i have other blowups/darkened views, etc., if anyone would like them as i tried different modifications to get a better view/image. thanks!
content.summary: Brother snapped what he thought was a shot of the mountans and later saw a disc in background

content.detailedDescription: I work for sony in tijuana mexico and it was around 4:30am and as i and a coworker were walking out to the dock area to take a picture of a loaded container he noticed a brite light in the night sky he called me over to where he was standing to show me what he was seeing i walked over and looked up and saw a brite purple light and it was zig zaging leaveing whit dotes on every turn it made we procedded to take a picture of it and when we snaped the first picture the light dissapierd as if it saw that we took a picture of it we were both amazed on how fast it was moving and how fast it dissapierd.
content.summary: Wierd light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm unsure of exact date and time as it happened about week ago or perhaps a bit more...Around feb 17th 2008 plus a day or two or minus a week or so???...I live between goshen and wakarusa indiana out in the country.
i had fallen asleep on the sofa and awoke (probably 2-2:30-ish a.M.?) and almost immediately saw outside our wide west window and near the very top a dark ,stout, heavy-bodied "airplane-looking thing" moving across my field of view from north to south...Total view time was maybe 2 seconds if that...More like glided by or floated...Not enough speed to be flying like normal planes do...Not a typical plane either at all...Wings connected fully along body and all looked way too stout...No lights...Too slow...Heard no sound...It appeared pretty large (best guess is somewhere between largest cessna-type to small commercial size) as it seemed to be quite close to the house and probably 100-400 feet off ground at most???......It appeared to be very similar to an airplane but just odd!!! (too heavy-looking)   ...Large tall vertical tail fin...Going quite slow, no lights or sound...Bizarre! very dark looking and basically silhouetted against a bit less dark sky...The closest thing it resembled too me would be if you kinda squashed a f117 nighthawk flat for the basic shape, put on a full traditional jetliner fuselage shape, and then stood a tail fin up really stout, big and tall. (tried to kinda draw it in "paint" but i'm not an artist...Fuselage was kinda tall looking and was more rounded and normalish than shows on my drawing.) craft was rather short-bodied and stout...Not long and sleek like something that would fly well...Looked like it was too fat almost to be flying but not quite. i thought perhaps i was still half asleep (guess i could have been but don't think so)  as it happened right after the point of awakening so i still leave room a tiny bit that i just imagined it...But my gut tells me i did see it as i was actually awake for a couple seconds first and focused on it and stared right at it as it went slowly across my field of view.  i heard nothing from inside the house. i suppose it could have made a small sound outdoors but if it made any noise, it was next to none as it was very close and i heard absolutely nothing. any plane at that close distance would have sounded like it was gonna take the roof off and would have probably scared me outta my wits. ???????????????????????????? (and no drugs or drinking for me~ever...Just a regular joe)
content.summary: Dark,stout heavy-bodied airplane look...Large vertical tail fin... slow, no lights or sound

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving in her car on our way to her house around 7:20 7:25 p.M. 2/27/08. she was driving; as we came close to the golf course near my house i noticed directly infront of us (around 1500 feet in the sky) 2 distinct objects descending at an alarming rate.  both of the objects had what looked to be a fire trail.  objects had a circular head and comet like fire tail.
the head looked like a bright perfectly round light with trail following.

at first look i actually thought they were missles descending. we stopped the car and watched the objects disappear instantly in their descent. then as fast as they were gone multiple circular intense huge lights lit up in unisen were the comet like objects disapeared...There was 5 or 6 of them spread out in a loose cluster. they remained hovering in their prospective positions, and in the same fashion they lit up out of no where...They extinguished in unisen. then 2 maybee 4 seconds passed and the the objects re lit in the same area but slightly different positions and remained hovering.

the extinguishing and re lighting of these objects huge lights occured 3 times that i saw.....Each time the objects remained hovering and reappeared in different positions all in a loose cluster.

after the third time....The lights did not re ignite.


during this whole event there was a helicopter circling the area were event was taking place.....The size of each light compared to the helicopter was that of a softball compared to a golf ball....These lights were huge, brilliant, and steady no flashing or blinking. no mistaking them for anything other than ufo's



simply amazing event; im just glad my girlfriend witnessed it as well. when we got home we were hoping there would be a report on the local news.
there was a ufo sighting report on our local news channel which showed video of objects like we witnessed; however the sighting was from january 6 '08 no report on the sighting we witnessed that night.  ironic and strange....But to be expected.
content.summary: Multilple large brilliant spheres appearing and disappearing  in loose cluster.....5 or 6 seperate spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard looking into the early night sky for satellites, as i often do.  on that night, november 13th, 2007, at about 8:30 p.M., i observed an orange, spherical, pulsating light that appeared to be about the same distancd in space as satellites, which i have seen on many occasions.  at first it was stationary, but because it was too big to be a star and it was definitely not a satellite, i fully expected it to move, which it did.  

in fact, within a few seconds after i first saw it, it began to move in a southerly direction.  it only took a few seconds for it to move a distance of about 18 inches with reference to the tips of my fingers at the end of my extended arms.  then it stopped, all of the time emitting, not reflecting, a pulsating, orange light.  i called for my wife to join me, which she did.  we both watched it in the stationary position for a short time, perhaps a minute, when it moved to the west, then back to the north, finally returning to about the same place where it had moved on its first stop, then it moved to the east and disappeared.  

later, my wife went to look for it again.  it had moved further to the west.  she called me to come, and i observed it for the second time as well, but only for a few seconds, and it disappeared.  

it is hard to believe that this object, whatever it was, was not under the control of some intelligent being, either by an occupant or by some remote power source. 

interestingly, i later went to the google site and entered:  "ufo san diego november 13 2007", and got several reports of others who made similar sitings that night, and two girls in san diego had videoed a siting at around 8 p.M.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed pulsating spherical light high in the sky--stationary, then moved

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on the i-15 freeway heading south. around 6:24 pm (pst) a small white light in the southeast direction (that i assumed to be airplane lights; because i had just passed miramar air force base and i was nearing a flight instructor school) which was moving in a horizontal direction high in the sky instantly grow to three times its size; and was a solid white light. i slowed down to about 65 mph and began observing this object from the far left lane. beneath the large white light a large white flare-like object appeared, it didn���t emerge from large light, it just appeared and began to descend. another ���flare��� appeared but at a distance beneath the initial flare. a third flare appeared beneath the second flare. all of the ���flares��� feel at about the same speed and all had a lashing white tail. the original large white light was still moving at the same rate of speed. sudden all of the flares went out at once, they didn���t fizzle out they just vanished. the large white light shrink and within a second it too went out. about three seconds later the second later two of the flares reappeared; i think it was the first and the third flares because they appeared in the same vicinities. a second after the first and third flares appeared the second flare appeared followed be the large white light. the flares no longer had their lashing tails, the looked similar to the large light now. as they appeared they slowed and began to align vertically. when they were in somewhat of a vertical alignment they all went out again but all at once. these lights did not return. about thirty or so seconds later a small white light appear to the southwest. from this light a blue light emerged from it and moved horizontally to the left, it was about the same size of the small light. these lights were a equal distance appear, about the same distance off headlights seen at a hundred yards away. the small white light turned red for a second and when it did these two lights accelerated across the sky to the west; they maintained their distance from each other for a second. the blue light sped up and appeared to reemerge with the small white light and when it did there was a small blink before the light(s) vanished. during this event i called and mentioned it to my family. when i got home i told my older brother about the event. we went outside and started to look in the general vicinity of where the event might have been if they were to see it; which was west. as we were talking i kept looking in the direction of where the event occurred and suddenly spotted a similar large white light. passenger planes where heading in the direction of this large white light, both of us began comparing this large white light to the landing lights on the planes. the large white light suddenly went out. i hopped up on a small flood-prevention wall that is against our house so i could see over the houses in the distance and could not see the object. the large white light appear about ten seconds later and performed a ���s��� like maneuver while moving west and then vanished when it completed the maneuver; this second sighting occurred just before 7:00 pm; i didn���t even have enough time to settle in. i���ve been darting outside since.
content.summary: Large light drops three "flares", all burnout, all reappear and align.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving towards jamul on the old 94 or campo rd i noticed a flying object out the drivers seat window. the object was zig zaging and moving unlike anything i seen before. sparks were falling from the object and i thought is was a missle, an air plane possibly crashing, or rudolph the red nose raindeer(i almost crashed watching this this thing). i stopped at the jamul general store. along with several bystanders, we all watched this amazing light. at this point i noticed there were two flying objects. the one that was sparking actually exploded. i heard the explosion as well as saw the bright light. the second object hoovered over us an seemed as it was flying down over out heads at a super fast speed. i actually jumped out the way i thought it was going to hit us. it just stayed over us for a while then in a matter of about 5-10 seconds, it looked like it flew into outter space. it was crazy. this was not something of this world. i believen in aliens and firmly believe this was a space craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red light

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work, it was dark, but not for long (abt 6pm-ish).  many regular lights (cars, street lights, lights from side of freeway, as usual.  a light drew my attention upward flying over the freeway directly above me going east directly west out to ocean.  it was a cigar shaped "glow"(cliche, i know, but it was!) and it looked as  though a helicopter might (same height)be flying over, but, through clouds or fog... (the light looked cloud or fog-shrouded).  i know it made me look up because it was bright enough, yet, odd enough to look toward it.  it moved at the speed a helicopter might  at about 500 ft. but was so oddly clouded and oddly shaped it made me think "what it that?" it had steady light, no blinking light.  it moved at a swift pace (maybe 50-100mph) twrd the sea.  i remember looking at the sky to see if it was cloudy on the coast... and it was perfectly clear.  that's when it kind of freaked me out.  i really don't go for the ufo thing...But this was really weird.  i told my family about it when i got home... and they thought i may have work too many hours!  not like me.... but it was worth telling. 
anyway, saw your story on the news tnite and felt compelled after listening to the college kids (but could not definitely say my sighting was near the same time as theirs.)  i will say, just like those kids, i would not write this unless i felt i actually saw something worth telling.  what those college boys described sounded like what i may have witnessed going out to sea over cardiff. i still wonder if anyone else saw what i saw .... it was fast, but still very obvious.  i also feel very odd writing about this.  i hope it helps!
content.summary: Cloud like (clear sky) moving east-west ovr hwy5 at manchestr-helicprtr hi

content.detailedDescription: I was at my sister house on university avenue we were watching tv when my nephews started screaming saying to look outside and as we came outside we looked up and there was 3 creamy, white circles they were in a horizontal line. it seem as they were floting its hard to explain. i told my sister maybe it was a pole with lights or something but as we took a good look at it they seem to be flying slowy.Then the first circle went off and the other two went off a second from each other and they disapeared. then a minute later the three of them camback but now the were in a straight line and then a gain they turned off one by one we waited to see if they came back but we did not sow them again. my sister and her family started screaming that they were ufo's i told them that maybe the'll say something in the news that maybe it was one of those testing things that the military do i hope some else beside us sow it to come to a conclution of what it was. we werent able to take a pic or video tried using my cellphone but i was too dark and it all happened so fast that i my self still dont know what to make of it. i hope someone might of had a chance to record it.
content.summary: It was like a white, creamy  circle

content.detailedDescription: I was at work next to 16th and k and i look a little bit right of the coronado bridge and see these three lights and one of them looked like it was a firework it was an orange ball and reminded me of what a spark from fireworks looks like when its falling so i automatically assumed that petco was having fireworks except i didn't hear any noise and the remaining lights weren't falling they sort of hover and moved down slowly then they both disappeared. a few seconds later i see one of the lights reappear and looks as though it was moving up and down and to the side a bit, not abrupt movements but slight ones. then the second one reappears and a few minutes later the one above it disappears. the second eventually left my view.
content.summary: 3 to 4 orange lights over downtown one of them had a tail like a meteor

content.detailedDescription:
We were (i was) driving home from a new years eve party about 12:30-1:00am n/b on i-5 n/of balboa ave. (rose canyon area).  my wife pointed out several lights in the sky that looked strange. we saw numerous lights (similar to aircraft landing lights, except they were singular, not flashing, blinking or changing intensity, as aircraft landing lights do) in the sky to the n/e. they appeared to be stationary or moving very slowly.  we thought it was aircraft (helicopters) from the local mira mar air station.  the lights stayed in the same area, appearing to be stationary and we lost the sighting only by driving out of the area.

tonight i just saw a news story on our the local fox news.  they reported that other people saw them too, but said they were probably small hot air ballons.  if they were hot air baloons, the color would have been more amber or yellow, not a bluish white, and would have been dimmer and smaller.  i am a recently retired chp (california highway patrol) officer and have worked that area of the i-5 for 13 years, so i am familar with the area.  my wife is a city official, we both had just a few drinks earlier in the evening, i had 2 drinks over 3 hours prior to the sighting, so we were not intoxicated.  i would be curious to know what the lights were.
content.summary: 5-8 round white/blue lights in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down denver towards clairamnt drive when i saw 5 or 6 lights moving oddly, i thought they could be helicoptors, but it looked weird. anyways i kept looking when suddenly 4 of the light headed downward quickly, much faster then a helicopter, and turned into this fire ball , flame, something like you see on tv in a metor show..Orange and white colored and disappered. only to reappear a split second later. i called a friend and said look out your window at this strang light, he did but there was nothing!!! then he said oh there it is. the light was white there one split second then gone! he said it must be airplanes tring to land at the airport that they turn there light son and off while waiting to land... umm hello airplanes do not stay complety still in the sky?  anyhow driving home there was a lot of activity in the sky light seemed to align up, they moved quickly back and forth up and down, like stright up and down without hesitation.. i'm not saying it's visitors from another plant i thought there was some goverment testing of aircrafts or a metor shower. i really can't say what it was only that it was odd and not a helicopter and it wasn't a plane. if anyone else saw this please let me know...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Many lights in sky, then sudden fall of 4 lights turned to a fire tail like a metor?

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i had just left her house and it was almost dark but still some light dusk and i was driving and i said what's that my mom said what and i said up there and pointed and she said what and i pointed again up into the sky and i said it looks like a ufo and the formation seemed to be changing  and i watched it just seemingly disappear.  i have never said look there's a ufo or anything like that before.  i was shocked when the 10 oclock news said it was going to have a ufo sighting on it and stayed up to watch i thought it was what i had seen and i even called my mom to tell her to watch.  it wasn't talking about my sighting it was about others.  i was disappointed.  i wonder if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: 4 or 5 very separate circle lights in somewhat of a inverted v formation

content.detailedDescription:
11:28 p.M. est  i was outside my studio and looked up to check out the stars ( i do that alot )then i saw 4 seperate orange colored lights tight formation 2 by 2  high above lights seems to intensify must have come from the southeast but when i saw them they were directly overhead....No sound....Moved indepently ( like a nat )of each other then one of the lights converged with the other two....Then seperated...Was not normal
headed north by north east towards summit and portage counties....No sound...I have never seen anything like that before....Please check it out. it was twice as bright as mars when mars was at it closest point to earth a month or so ago... lost sight as objects moved toward the north by northeast  sorry i am still shaking and still have goose bumps from the event.
content.summary: 4 orange color lights moved independently of each other but tight formation

content.detailedDescription: It was late summer i beleave me and a freind of mine paul platt were standing on an observation point at carlyle lake at about 9-30 10 o-clock at nite looking at the sky and when i noticed from the west in the direction of st louis mo about 35 40 miles away a briter than normal  lite was coming far of in the distance .Seemed a lil to bright for a normal plane, well we keep looking at it for a while about 5- 10 min . we notice this thing is moveing not like a regular aircraft, it it zig zaging unlike an air craft is known to be able to do but it is moveing slow and i mean slow ecept when it would zig zag , well it stops the zig zag stuff  and then just keeps coming staight another 5 min goes by and it is close to us real close about 150-175 yrds away from us at about a 45 degree angel it is huge and it makes no sound but a low hum its moveing so slow how is it staying up there the sky slightly has it lit up from the town lights it is a triangle three bright white lights on the bottom and a few in the rear which are smaller about five of them it passes by and slowly moves away we dont know what to think we tell a few people mostly our freinds and some make fun of us some just humor us  but we know what we saw and thats why i havent told but a few more pople since all those years ago most just look at you and say yeah right . but it was something
content.summary: The black triangle with 3 bright lites on bottom and some in the rear

content.detailedDescription:
Relaxing in my hot tub looking at the sky.  noticed a chevron shape coming from the south, in the western sky.  lots of little lights on each side of the chevron, which made me notice it.  lots means maybe a dozen on the long side (west side i think) and six  or more on the other side.  it went straight north then i could not see it.  it disappeared when it reached the northern sight line.  i kept looking for it to come back as there is an airport to the west, about 3 miles, but it did not return so i know it was not an aircraft.  
it almost looked like a string of "christmas lights" - white lights by the way - floating through the sky.  it was very eerie.
content.summary: South to north in western sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way over to check my livestock i was talking to my neighbor and parked in front of the barn.  i hung up the phone and as i reached for the door handle the handle turned super bright with light.  then i noticed the entire north side of the barn was reflecting this light.  i quick ran to the north so i could see where this bright light was coming from the east.  as i looked there was the brightest light i had ever seen fling across the horizon.  it was white to whitish geen and pulse three to four times and shot a trail of goldish orange light out the back side.  it looked like fire and was moving at a terrific speed.  after the orange glow substance shot out it was gone.  it was moving from the south to the northeast.  my hair stood straight up on the back of my head.  my neighbor was four miles to the west at home in his yard and he called me and said "did you see that".  we were both in amazement and shocked.  we then talked for a while. we decided to call local sherriffs office and asked if anybody else had seen the light.  it was wittened up to 12 miles away ans was also seen by into police as well.
content.summary: Bright light flying across horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my front porch just looking around.  it was dark.  i happened to look up in the sky and i saw an extra bright light and as i looked at it, it would move slowly to the right and left of me and would come closer and then move back.  i went back inside and got my wife and daughter to come see if they were seeing what i was.  they saw the same thing.  i got my binoculars out and looked at it and could see it better.  still have no idea what it was.  it has not been back in the sky since then each time i checked.

the object had a bright light with 5 small lights below it.  it appeared to be all one object.  the small lights moved with the large object.  the object moved only a few degrees across the sky.  the object was viewed in the ne sky at dark from stephenville at about 45 degrees above the horizen.
content.summary: Saw extra bright light in sky from porch

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home heading east in corona noticed what looked like a jet trail situated vertically in the western sky over the hills.  at first i thought it was just a cloud, (strange though that it was vertical) but when i got out of my car at home i noticed it was moving and the trail was vertical to what must have been quite a large falling object.  as we watched the object fall it moved in a more southerly or horizontal direction.  
we could see thru binoculars that it appeared to be a very large object that might perhaps go on to land in the ocean.  we finally lost sight of it when it went behind the hills near our house. there were a couple of airplanes in the area, they must have seen this too.  but there has been nothing on the news, and besides my husband, son, and our neighbor i haven't talked to anyone else who saw this.
content.summary: Object falling out of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On my way to tomy's restaurant i was walking along a main street on the sidewalk.  to my left across the street i saw a small object enter the atmosphere.  it slowly came closer to me, as i could see it had a small white round light on the front of it.  when the object was about 150 feet from me it stopped, and then disappeared.  the only thing remaining was the light.  the object, before disappearing, looked like an irregular gray blob.  its wings were different sizes with uneven protrusions.  i watched the light for about 40 seconds before moving on down the street.  thank you.

i was not too surprised to see this object being that ufos are a common ground in my area.  or at least i had many close encounter sightings, almost all in this area.
content.summary: I saw a small object enter the atmosphere to my left, as i was walking.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was walking home at night along a main street i saw to my left ahead of me a large white light at a very low altitude.  as i walked through an apartment complex, and trees i saw the light at times.  w#hen i got to the preschool on my street i saw it, and it stopped.  i was near the street sidewalk looking northward, as the object was hovering silently over the preschool playground.  the large bottom of it was painted white, and 16 feet in diameter.  there was a tower in the middle of it made of dark bubbled glass.  it was dark inside, as there was no light emanant.  in the front of it where it was painted white was two high beam car headlights.  they were close together.  after viewing this object for about 2 and a half minutes it budged a foot northward then took off with amazing speed.  the only way i was able to determin it path of departure was by the tracer its headlights left.  it went northward at 20% from the horizon.

i was most amazed by its speed.  it really did not look like it could go very fast, and it looked kind of junky.  it took off a couple of seconds after i thought that probably teenage aliens are flying it, and that it does not go very fast being that it related to a busted up car.  actually it was in pretty good condition.  the paint looked pretty fresh, and its bubble glass tower was made in panels about 6 feet high.  the tops of each panel was cut flat on top, and then angled on each side.  i still think that the panels would not be able to stay in place with such acceleration.  or that they would greatly slow down the object.  thank you.  i have many more sightings to share with you.  i do not know why i had so many of them.  orbs of different sort have been in my area since 1986.  i have 8 hours of dvd footage on them that i took.  i wish i can share it with you, but i do not have the software to upload it, and i do not know how to.  is there a snail mail address for mufon where i can copy my dvds to vhs, and send it to you? i filmed some saucers, and some other interesting, unexplained anomulous objects.  also i was abducted twice (when i was 4 and 26).  are you interested in abduction, and alien encounter experiences? i have it all written down.  to do one at a time on your form would be too much work.  unless i send them by pasting.  thanks again.
content.summary: It came up to me and stopped.  its speed when it went was astounding.

content.detailedDescription: At around 10:00 pm, my husband went outside to smoke before bed time. in just a minute or two, he ran in the door yelling for me to come outside and look at this. i immediately grabbed my glasses and went outside where he showed me an object flying very slowly west over hiway 377. it had three huge lights--a very bright white light and bright red and blue flashing lights. i then went in the house and called my teenage son to come out to see it. we all decided that it could not be a plane because it was flying too slow and it could not be a helicopter because it made no sound. my husband tried to snap a picture with a regular digital camera, but the camera was not made for great distance at night. the guys decided it was flying at around a half mile altitude. it was quite large to be that far away. we just watched it from our front yard untill a treeline blocked it from sight.
content.summary: Slow moving flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: Jellyfish like.Planes and birds passed by. not a balloon..
content.summary: Looked gellyfish shape.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving home down main street around 1 am and i see this huge light i though it was an airplane that was about to crash but then i looked closer and realized it wasnt an airplane because it was triangle shaped and it had no sound. in other words, it was low enough to the ground to see its full shape. it eased down and then flipped really really quick and went back the way it came and dissapeared within 5 seconds.... i was freaking out. then i went home and drew a picture of it.
content.summary: Really close to ground and dissapeared within 5 sec

content.detailedDescription: Except for today all other previous time there are two lights in perpendicular / position one lower toward the left side and the higher up toward the right side. these from a distance facing east or south east depending on what side of the us/mexico border you are. they are like two dots on a horizontal or when the light is coming at dawn you can see two very small dots of light. i usually wait until the first day of light is in because of the daylight you can hardly see them. today there was only one light but because it was a later time than the one on yesterday, tuesday 02/27/08. as a concluding point these lights seem to be on a stationary basis since from the last three months when i decided to look into the sky and on my way to the border i happen to see them; and they are very distinctly specially at that hour you just can't miss it. that it if you pay attention to them which is not very difficult to do. i even questioned a newspaper vendor a young girl and she did agreed to me that she has seen them. needles to say i have always been very much interested in everything related to ufo's since i was an adolescent. the image seem to be like an stationary base because it does not shine like a star. it's like a station like glow. i tried to take a photo with my digital camera but it did show on the hp screen, but i have the images from tne shopping center on this side of the border but again you can't see the lights from here. but i can tell you distinctly where the lights were at the time. i will go to target and get those to you.I need you address to mail them to you since i am writing from a public computer and can't feed the data into the hard drive from here.
content.summary: I already reported this sigt and a gentleman from san diego called me but i do not have a record. he called me monday 02/25/at night and request ed from me to report him again if i saw the ufo. i checked it this morning @ 06:00 am and sure enough there it

content.detailedDescription: Since last august, i have been seeing what appears to be star-like objects moving or zigzagging up and down or side to side but staying within their own dusty looking atmosphere.  i call them the 'dancing stars!'  i finally decided to try and capture an image of a few of them when i couldn't get to sleep one night in november.  the three images i've included is the outcome of my endeavor, which my boyfriend thought came out like they did because of the way i had my camera settings set up. lately however, at different ufo websites, i have been reading reports and seeing very similar types of images which have been referred to as 'exterrestrial symbols.' i'd sure like to know if what i've captured are being made by ufos because they are in different heights and distances all around the sky over my house all the time.  every night the sky is clear, i go outside right after it gets dark to wave at a few of them and when i do, each one will start dancing around like crazy. be sure to enlarge each image for a better view!
content.summary: Dancing star-like objects in the sky all the time captured on digital camera
